name: John Doe
bio: I am a Python developer passionate about automation, cloud technologies, and building tools that solve real-world problems.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: Displays real-time weather information using OpenWeatherMap API with a sleek UI.

projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.description: A web-based tool to track and categorize daily expenses, with visual charts.

projects.title: QR Code Generator
projects.description: Generates custom QR codes from text or URLs using Python and outputs PNGs.

projects.title: PDF Merger
projects.description: Combines multiple PDFs into one using PyPDF2; supports drag and drop CLI usage.
